price: "Cuando muramos y nos convirtamos en polvo y huesos, ¿seremos resucitados?
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبۡعُوثُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban waʿiẓāman a-innā lamabʿūthūna
